overview:
## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogramType] instance.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogramType] concrete subclass. Use this type to request permission to read [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogram] objects from the HealthKit store.

# electrocardiogramType()

**Type Method**

Returns the shared electrocardiogram type.

## Declaration

```swift
class func electrocardiogramType() -> HKElectrocardiogramType
```

## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogramType] instance.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogramType] concrete subclass. Use this type to request permission to read [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogram] objects from the HealthKit store.
title: electrocardiogramType()
